Zoetrope Labs | Bristol, UK ONSITE | Full full stack software engineer (Python, JS, C/C++) | https://zoetrope.io

Zoetrope is a IoT and connected product consultancy and development startup. We've rapidly grown over the last year and are working with large household name companies (some of whom are not named on our website just yet). We're just getting started and are looking to grow our core team of developers/consultants. Generally looking for all-rounders who are just as at home with developing software as talking with clients and working out solutions to problems with them.

You'll make prototype and production code working with both startups and larger companies, get control over the tools you use and when you work.

Full job spec and application details: https://zoetrope.io/careers/software-engineer
